i am currently a student at the great "maseno university" taking pure mathematics and computer science. the two disciplines sprinkle junks of flavourable salt to my graphic design journey as they open my creativity to infinity. i actively take part in clubs and societies where i gain lots of collaboration skills and team working. im in so much love with MUCISA an association that has made this my portfolio dream come true.

as early stated, i am a dynamic and multifaceted graphic designer whose creative prowess extends across the full spectrum of design and development, i craft my work of art using the latest versions of graphic design softwares:

  • Adobe photoshop
  • Adobe illustrator
  • Adobe after effects
  • Adobe premier pro
  • corel draw
